pkgmetadata.longdescription: TLP is a collection of scripts enabling laptop-mode and implementing power save features for laptop hardware. See the upstream docs and https://github.com/dywisor/tlp-gentoo-additions.

use.flag: Rely on sys-power/pm-utils for handling system suspend/hibernate/resume. Only users of sys-apps/systemd may disable this flag.
Radio device wizard: switch radios upon network connect/disconnect and dock/undock
Use the bundled tpacpi-bat script instead of app-laptop/tpacpi-bat.
Allow parallel installation of app-laptop/laptop-mode-tools and app-laptop/tlp. NOT RECOMMENDED
